title: China Baoji Bliss in the Heart of the City with Four Restaurants
description: Uncover a long history studded with emperors, culture and temples when you stay at Crowne Plaza Baoji City Center, an IHG Hotel. This ultra-modern escape in the heart of a historic city welcomes explorers from all over the world to enjoy its myriad of excellent facilities, including a grand indoor swimming pool and fitness centre. Meanwhile, the four onsite restaurants will satisfy your every craving, whether you're hungry for hotpot, sizzling Sichuan or mouthwatering Cantonese.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Baoji City Center, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 66 Jintai Avenue, Jintai District, Baoji 721000, China
